name: Documenting Designs: Spacers
description:
Here is a set of spacers that can be helpful in documenting your designs for your teammates. In this file you'll find 60 variants in two color options if your design system is using an 8px grid, and another 60 variants in two colors if you use at 10px grid system.


--


I initially created these (and a few others) to share how our cross-functional teams at SEP approach collaboration. You can find my blog post here.
